t: Amazon.com: Mozaist | Turkish Mosaic Lamps: Battery Operated Table Lamps
s: It comes with 3 parts in the package. Mosaic glass globe, upper part, and metal base. The metal body equipped with LED Bulb, it only works with 2xAA alkaline batteries, extra bulb can't be added. First of all, compress the springs into the brass metal body, attach the glass sphere.
